page.title: 04The Residents.
page.content: When we were on the island there were about 15 residents working for the Landmark Trust- but numbers vary seasonally and according to on-going building work and other developments. (The South Light has a complement of 3 keepers and they are relieved monthly) Most of the Landmark employees do a variety of jobs -many of them to do directly with the tourist trade: servicing and maintaining the visitors accomodation,transporting luggage and provisions,manning the office,shop and tavern... One person acts as brewer and market gardener-and recently someone has been employed to run a restaurant upstairs in the Tavern. The other main activities are farming and the improvement and repair of buildings.The water supply and sewage systems have also been improved and an aero-generator has been installed.
